No water pressure in shower. And they are going to start charging $22 to park for every truck. They are putting the gates in now. We give these truckstops way too much control bring back the mom and pops. Before too long they will charge us ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ people who work in there really care about the customer. Most of the parking is paid now including all the bobtail spaces,I waited for over an hour for a dirty shower with no hot water,and everything has gone up in price,just a damb shame

I was told in the hospital that the Y gave people free showers.  I became homeless about a month ago, and I see the way people treat others when they are down.  So I went and prepared to pay oh, I went to the desk watch the lady looked at ‚Ä¶

"Small hidden fees."   Rented a room for a baby shower.  Said pool access was included...  turns out there is a 5 dollar fee per person.  Not to mention the toys around outside for kids... turns out, kids are not supposed to play with them.
Worst shower I ever had.  Will not be coming back
